definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
government/official (approved or issued by an authority)
public prosecutor/public procurator (judicial officer whose job may involve both criminal investigation and public prosecution)
senior official/senior officer/commanding officer/CL:位[wei4]/sir (term of address for senior officer)

sentences.english: Upon Duke Ning's death, his son Jia Daihua succeeded him on the official position.
sentences.chinese: 宁公死后，贾代化袭了官，也养了两个儿子。

sentences.english: That said, I recommend this book to anyone who is the family CFO.
sentences.chinese: 总的说来，我推荐这本《如何成为家庭首席财务官》。

sentences.english: Our consular officers are required to give the reason in writing.
sentences.chinese: 我们的领事官必须书面说明拒签原因。

sentences.english: In the long run of history, the censorship and the inquisitor have always lost.
sentences.chinese: 在历史的长河中，审查制度和审查官总是迷失了方向。

sentences.english: You'll report to me here. Butthe Consulate Security Man must not know that I am in Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 但是领事馆的治安官不能知道我在伊斯坦布尔。

sentences.english: He had never held any public office besides country election commissioner.
sentences.chinese: 他除了县选举委员外，没做过任何官。

sentences.english: He's the sheriff at Twin Gulch, Idaho, and I'm his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 他是爱达荷州特温加尔奇的治安官，我是他的副手。

sentences.english: Gail: I’m the CMO for Asco International.
sentences.chinese: 我是Asco国际公司的首席营销官。

sentences.english: For that matter , a sheriff ‘s wife is married to the law .
sentences.chinese: 就这一点看，治安官他妻子嫁给法律了。

sentences.english: The elder judge finally decided that either Sara or May would get the position.
sentences.chinese: 年长的评审官最后决定当选者要么是萨拉，要么是梅。

sentences.english: The average chief marketing officer lasts just two years and two months.
sentences.chinese: 首席营销官平均两年又两个月一换。

sentences.english: My second brother was then Judge there.
sentences.chinese: 我的二哥那时候在那里做法官。

sentences.english: Soft yee fu enter the palace, become a female officer.
sentences.chinese: 傅柔阴差阳错下进入皇宫，成为司织女官。

sentences.english: I was lured to the Enfield store by the Krispy Kreme website.
sentences.chinese: 我是被卡卡圈坊官网上的话吸引到埃菲尔德分店的。

sentences.english: He had served as chief technology officer of Oracle's client software group.
sentences.chinese: 高斯林曾担任甲骨文客户软件部的首席技术官。

sentences.english: Our company now has an ombudsman ?
sentences.chinese: 我们公司现在有调查官了？

definition: an official position/a job in the bureaucracy
imperial censor (formal title of a dynastic official)
name of job in Imperial bureaucracy/official position
